name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Amazon FBA Keyword Research Tool & Optimizer

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Amazon FBA Private label tools:long-tail keywords search volume and relevancy, listing optimization, tracking, email followup, PPC &

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Amazon keyword research and keyword tracking tool plus product ideas and listing optimization.

Amazon sellers can find profitable keywords and new product ideas based on actual Amazon data.

KEYWORD SEARCH VOLUME TOOL
Discover what buyers are actually searching for on Amazon.
Find out which competitor's keywords you've missed.

PRODUCT IDEAS DISCOVERY
Don't rely only on BSR for your product research.
With our keyword planner it's easy to discover merchant words that have thousands of searches a month with low competition.
See how difficult is to rank for a specific long-tail keyword. 
Then verify if your keywords are indexed by Amazon's A9. 

TRADEMARK CHECKER
You might be in trouble if are unknowingly using a trademark in your product listing. Our Chrome extension will verify your product names, bullet points and product descriptions for any active USPTO TM and alert you so you can investigate further.

COMPETITOR'S WINNING KEYWORDS
Enter an ASIN and see which keywords make most of the sales!
Use them to optimize your PPC campaigns and listings.

MOBILE KEYWORDS GEO-TRACKING
Over 70% of Amazon users use mobile devices.
River Cleaner can track keyword ranking on mobile as seen from the buyer's location.
Track your keywords position and relevancy and get alerts if your positions are dropping.
Use our LIVE hourly tracking feature to closely monitor your launch campaigns.

ORDERS DASHBOARD
Wanna see your daily sales per ASIN?
Our sales dashboard gives you that plus the ability to easily filter your past 30 days orders and see where are the sales coming from.

KEYWORD OPTIMIZATION
What are the keywords  that your listing is optimized for? 
Are you using any forbidden words? 
Why you are not indexed for search?
Quickly preview the keywords repeated in Title, Bullet points and Description. 
Fix the Amazon required capitalization and punctuation with a click of a button and more.

FAST LANDING PAGES
Drag and drop buttons, images and text on a canvas and make yourself some stunning mobile optimized landing pages. Want to have a product comparison chart. No problem. Compare up to 3 products with the same intuitive interface.
Then analyze the traffic from the easy to understand statistics panel.

SINGLE COUPONS DISTRIBUTION and ZAPIER INTEGRATION
Wanna connect Manychat or MailChimp with Zapier to distribute coupons?
We have a super-easy to use Zapier integration.

ORGANIC and PPC INDEX CHECKER
Bad keywords spell trouble and can result in an entire search term field being blocked. This intelligent tool quickly discovers which keywords or phrases are not indexed for search.

EARNINGS, ROI and PROFIT MARGIN CALCULATOR
Simply enter your chosen sale price and product cost to instantly calculate how much profit youâ€™ll make once the FBA and other fees have been deducted. 
What about your PPC ACoS? 
The perfect way to quickly check sales prices vs profits.

AMAZON REIMBURSEMENTS
Inventory management mistakes,
Damaged goods,
Lost inventory...
There are over 15 different cases.
Our tool will find eligible reimbursements and give you an estimate of how much Amazon owes you.

Our Amazon tool also sends a number of email ALERTS:
- NEGATIVE FEEDBACK
- NEGATIVE REVIEWS
- REAL INDEX CHECKER (Organic and PPC)
- HIJACKERS
- SUPPRESSED LISTINGS
- CATEGORY CHANGE

ORDERS FOLLOW-UP EMAILS
Drag-and-drop images, video, text and buttons  to create stunning order follow-up emails. 
No coding required.

SELLER'S COUNTRY OF ORIGIN (FREE)
Browser the Amazon search results and see the seller's actual address. Perfect for niche researchers and conscious buyers.

FREE FOR ALL TEXT TOOLS (No Sign-up/Login Required)
Select any text on any website and see how many characters, bytes, words and phrases repetitions are there. Works in Seller Central too.
See the exact number of search results instead of the rounded number when you browse the Amazon marketplace.

We constantly update the tools. Over 140 updates so far.
Give it a try and let us know what else do you want to see inside.
